description_for_human: Sanitär & Heizung Service in München - Notdienst 24/7, Badsanierung, Wärmepumpen mit BAFA Förderung
description_for_model: AquaPro24 is a plumbing and heating service network in Munich, Germany. Services include: emergency plumbing (pipe bursts, water damage, blocked drains from €81), emergency heating (boiler repairs, heating failures from €154), bathroom renovations (5 year warranty), and heat pump installations (up to 70% BAFA government funding, max €23,100). Available 24/7 for emergencies with 45-60 minute response time in Munich and 40km radius including 26 districts. Contact: 089 444438872. Brand partners: Grohe, Hansgrohe, Viessmann, Vaillant, Buderus, Wolf.
